newsitem.title: USA: U.S. to sell $13 billion of 3-, 6-mo bills April 7.
newsitem.headline: U.S. to sell $13 billion of 3-, 6-mo bills April 7.

text.p: The Treasury Department said on Tuesday it will auction $13 billion of three- and six-month bills on April 7 to pay down $5.8 billion as a total of $18.811 billion of bills are maturing.
The weekly bill sale will be equally divided between the two maturities. The bills will be issued on April 10. The three-month bills mature on July 10 and the six-month bills mature on October 9.
The CUSIP number for the three-month bills is 9127945F7 and for the six-month bills is 9127945Q3.
